io_size

Device to calculate the size of the input and output blocks for complex and real ffts.

io_size<D,std::complex<T>,T,A>
result

General case: when result is distributed, we use a Dense block because Fast_blocks do support non-local maps (060512).

result<T,BlockT,Local_map>

Specialization: when result is local, we use a Fast_block, because it lets us match complex format of the input block.
